column5: Joining a 12 step program has helped me tremendously. Fought the god thing but now have a different vision about the higher power.   I find that my food and exercise compulsions are more about me controlling life (which is impossible), instead of accepting me and others for our humanness and trusting that their is a higher "thing" at work.
I used it and it was awful!!!!!  I would not recommend it.  The taste and the experience we're horrible
